frontmatter.title: Intro Post
frontmatter.hero_image_alt: a short description of the image, to be used as alternative text for screen readers or in case the image doesn’t load correctly
frontmatter.hero_image_credit_link: a link to the page where your hero image was downloaded from
frontmatter.hero_image_credit_text: the text to display to give the photographer credit for the hero image
